title: Cappy Tacos
instructions: Step 1: In a bowl, mix the oil with the salt and spices. Season the meat with the mixture.
Step 2: Place the meat in an oven and bake at 400ยบ F for 40 minutes.
Step 3: When ready, crumble it and place it on a container.
Step 4: Place the corn tortillas, drop the meat, add the pickled onions, add Ranch Sauce.
Step 5: Lastly, add Cappy Chile Toreado to your tacos and enjoy them.
